discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BCE
Workspace ONE Unified Access Gateway (UAG) includes the following three Workspace ONE Edge Services:

B. Content Gateway: Content Gateway provides secure access to content repositories and enables features like content filtering and DLP (Data Loss Prevention).

C. Secure Email Gateway: Secure Email Gateway is responsible for securing email communication on mobile devices, ensuring that emails are encrypted and protected.

E. VMware Tunnel: VMware Tunnel provides secure access to internal resources and applications behind the corporate firewall. It establishes a secure tunnel for mobile devices to access these resources without exposing them to the public internet.

The AirWatch Cloud Connector (A) and Workspace ONE Intelligence Connector (D) are separate components and not included within the Unified Access Gateway. They serve different purposes within the Workspace ONE ecosystem.

BCE - https://docs.vmware.com/en/Unified-Access-Gateway/index.html
VMware Tunnel
Tunnel is a modern VPN replacement providing full device and per application modes to enable remote access to any type of user. Unified Access Gateway appliance serves as the on-premises option for Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA) leveraging the Workspace ONE Tunnel app. VMware's ZTNA solution is also available as a hosted SaaS service as part of VMware's Secure Access Service Edge.

Additional use cases for Workspace ONE
Unified Access Gateway serves as a secure black box for deploying other Workspace ONE components including Content Gateway and Secure Email Gateway. These gateways can be used in conjunction with the Workspace ONE Content app, Workspace ONE Boxer app, and other native and third party mail clients.

questions.question_text: Which three Workspace ONE Edge Services are included in Unified Access Gateway? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
he VMware resiliency recommendation that would have prevented the outage described is:

A. High Availability (HA)

High Availability ensures that there are redundant components or servers in place to take over in case of a failure. In this scenario, having a High Availability setup for the AirWatch Cloud Connector (ACC) server would have prevented the outage caused by the single ACC server's disk error. If one server fails, the other can take over, ensuring continuity of service.

questions.question_text:
An administrator is tasked with determining the root cause for a recent outage where devices were not able to authenticate. An investigation revealed a single
AirWatch Cloud Connector (ACC) server that had a disk error which caused it to be completely unresponsive.
Which VMware resiliency recommendation would have prevented this outage?

choices.B: Workspace ONE UEM External Access Token
